about_the_game:
We’re launching our biggest pack yet with over 130 paint schemes! For the first time ever, players can play in race-winning paint schemes from 19 MENCS races. This NASCAR Heat 2 - December Jumbo pack will also have 84 playoff paint schemes from the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series, NASCAR XFINITY Series, and NASCAR Camping World Truck Series. Also included are 31 paint schemes from the MENCS and NXS regular season. Finally, 3 new Challenges await.

Expect paint schemes like the following:

MENCS:
Dale Earnhardt Jr. #88 Mountain Dew (Michigan)
Ricky Stenhouse Jr. #17 Fifth Third Bank (Talladega – Winner)
Martin Truex Jr. #78 Bass Pro Shops (Homestead – Playoff)
…
NXS
William Byron #9 Axalta / Windsor (Iowa)
Brad Keselowski #22 SKF (Pocono)
Cole Custer #00 Haas Automation (Kansas – Playoff)
…
CWTS:
Christopher Bell #4 JBL (Homestead – Playoff)
John Hunter Nemechek #8 FAS Pink (Talladega – Playoff)
Austin Cindric #19 Fitzgerald Glider Kites (Martinsville – Playoff)

Plus, many more!

This content is also included in the 2017 Hot Pass!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64bit Versions of Windows 7, 8 and 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 530 or AMD FX 4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or AMD HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcards
  • Additional Notes: Supported Graphics Cards: AMD HD5870 or better, HD6870 or better, HD7790 or better, R7 260 or better, R9 260 or better, Nvidia GTX460 or better, GTX560 or better, GTX650Ti or better, GTX750 or better, GTX950 or better
